column2: Steal a boon when interrupting an enemy. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 3 seconds)</c>

Grants a tiny amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>Ingenious construction causes this basket to provide the fishing village with a steady supply of delicious food for themselves and their raptors.</c>
Dodging removes a damaging condition and a non-damaging condition from you.
Recipe[s]: Bowl of Refugee's Beet Soup

Return to Keeper Pamir in the Ruination.
<c=@Flavor>Records of Forged and Awakened troop movements collected from an Order of Whispers listening device.</c>
Renown Item
The inscription claims this simulated feline perfectly recreates all cat interactions. Purchase price includes immediate installation in your home.

Grants a small amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>The choya seemed very excited to present you with this clump of glistening earth.</c>

Forgive my suspicion when you first came to us. I should have known to trust the wisdom of our elders, and in Nature's providence. Return to Athloma when you can, and know that you will be among friends when you do.
â€”Malor
The desperately needed supplies were barely delivered in time.
Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.
Slay veteran or higher-ranked Branded monsters to draw them out.
All Forgotten Lights retrieved. Return to the Flameseeker verse to read.
<c=@abilitytype>Turret.</c> Build a turret that fires rockets. This turret overcharges when it is first placed.
Reward for participating in PvP Leagues.
Recipe[s]: Bowl of Garlic Kale Sautee
Fire a dart loaded with an experimental tranquilizer. Rifle contains one round.
Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.
Gain 4 stacks of might (5 seconds) when you swap to this weapon while in combat. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 9 seconds)</c>
Double-click to apply this look to any other greatsword. This skin will be unlocked in your wardrobe for future use.
Created by combining 3 Mini Elegant Princess Llamas with an Essence of Llamatic Elegance in the Mystic Forge.
Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.
Deal 1%% extra damage per condition on your foe.
Add cripple and weakness to your plague and increase its damage dealt.
Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

Bring things to Mehsheh at Zephyr's Trace to help out the villagers.
Event Item
Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

On hit remove a condition.
(Cooldown: 10 seconds)
